column1: Friends may call after 3:00 p.m. Wednesday
column3: Kewaunee. Veterans services will be held at 6:30 p.m. and a parish wake service will be held at 7:00 p.m. Visitation continues at the funeral home on Thursday until 10:30 a.m. Mass of Christian Burial will be celebrated at 11:00 a.m. Thursday at Holy Rosary Church with Fr. Ron Colombo officiating followed by full military rites.
